a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Deaths from secondhand smoke, by age, World
Annual number of deaths from secondhand smoke (also known as 'passive smoking' which is the inhalation of
smoke by those who are not "active" smokers) by age group across both sexes.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
